messages.message:
Hiya team (and pydevs :python: in particular),

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72175 pushes an update to the `precommit` that should make our lives easier with `yapf` auto-staging the commited files, post-formatting :slightly_smiling_face:
If you observe any issues with it, flag it here (and if so we can revert) :slightly_smiling_face: Hopefully this makes us all the more productive! #devtools :rocket:

:dancing-penguin: This is lovely, because I _despise_ the current behavior :joy: My formatter is much nicer and I don't mind it oscillating between yapf and ruff, but the commit  blocking, yo... Especially since yapf isn't nearly opinionated enough for a formatter. lol
 :heart_hands::skin-tone-3: This is great!
@Cody Boggs frustration tends to be a great motivator  :joy:
